name: EX-802
description:
Published in memory of Esdeer aka BSOD - a game designer, a visual artist, a composer, a friend.

Slightly updated to Beta 4 in 2023 to fix the dumbest of bugs. 

Random game jam prototype I made with Esdeer in 2012. He proposed to make a game that changes gameplay from platformer to shmup and back, traversing in a zig-zag fashion, and this somewhat vague story:

2064 year.

A humanoid object fell from outer space to Earth, which was later called EX-802, but for simplicity - "Angel".

In appearance, she looked like a young girl in a futuristic costume.

When subject EX-802 woke up, she had no idea where she was.

In the course of research, it turned out that the Angel can be used as a combat unit, the strength of which grew when absorbing certain elements. The element types remain unknown.

A few years later, scientists noticed an object approaching our planet.

Several hundred ships broke into our atmosphere, but were stopped by the military forces of the earth.

Angel: It's calling me.

Angel: I'm going there immediately!

We were powerless to stop her.

Angel: Your planet has become my home, even if I am an alien. I will take your side. I will protect people.

The game was supposed to have 3 different characters and 2 different endings (turning against humanity or not), but the game jam was only 2 days and later we swiched to other projects.
